name: BADDIE
description:
#3 of sneakymoon's weekly crude mini game series

The last 2 weeks or so I was working on this game for DreamHack Austin Jam! We didn't win but it was still a fun project :)

Introducing BADDIE! This was going to be the start of a bigger game that I've been hyping up for years.....but I've decided to move a different direction with that project and made a quick dumb game instead!

WASD to move and J to attack

catchy cute tune by swinterville
